info: To create one choose the 'The Demon' option in the Character Creation screen and then continue through the story until Lv. 10 where you will be given the choice to choose between the 'Demon Avenger' or 'Demon Slayer' classes. You can also choose to skip the cutscenes at the beginning to go straight into choosing between the two classes

details: All 1st to 4th Job skills can be maxed
Put one SP into each skill first and then max each skill in this order
For any skills that have prerequisites, follow them first before following build path

hyperBuild.recommended:
• Exceed - Reinforce and Opportunity
  • Nether Shield - Reinforce and Spread
  • / Exceed - Reduce Overload OR Nether Shield - Range

nodeInfo.recommended:
Primary Trio
Secondary Trio
  • Any combination of these skills are good but preferred from same category as you want to max primary first
  • 4 Boost Nodes total are needed to reach Master Level 60 for these skills (with Matrix Points used)
    • Nodes with the same Main Skill (skill at the top) cannot be equipped at the same time

content.specialThanks: Special thanks to Kerkerseele and the members of the Demon Avenger Discord for their help in making this overview!

extraContent.title: Exceed Mechanic
extraContent.content:
Demon Avengers use HP for their attacks and do not have an MP resource. As well, instead of scaling off of STR like regular warriors, Demon Avengers' damage scales off of HP

Exceed

Using attacks labelled with 'Exceed' grants a stacking debuff called Overload (up to 20 stacks). At max stacks and for every 2 stacks, Life Sap (1st Job) effectiveness will be reduced

Additionally, repeatedly using Exceed attacks in quick succession will result in entering 'Exceed Mode', increasing the Attack Speed and HP Cost of the Exceed skills. Some skills also gain increased range or increased number of hits per attack

To reset your Overload stacks, you can use Overload Release (1st Job) to restore your HP and increase your %Final Damage based on the number of Overload stacks consumed

primary.name: Dark Winds
primary.shortDesc: High Jump: Press the up arrow key twice during a jump\nJag Jump: Press the right or left arrow key twice during a jump\nGlide: Jump Key (Maintain Press)
details:
Right-click the skill to toggle gliding
  • When on, you can perform a double jump but pressing the Jump Key twice instead

primary.name: Demonic Blood
primary.shortDesc: Willpower: Lv. 20, Ambition: Lv. 20, Knockback Resistance: +100%

primary.name: Exceed
primary.shortDesc: Life Sap -1% for every 20 Exceed Overload cap and 2 Overload stacks.\nOverload +1 when another Exceed skill is used while Exceed skill is in use.\nUsing Overload Release reduces the Exceed levels to half.
primary.desc: Using an Exceed attack grants a stacking debuff called Overload (up to 20 stacks). Repeatedly using Exceed attacks will cause you to enter Exceed Mode
details: [Overload]: At max stacks and for every 2 stacks, effectiveness will be reduced

[Exceed Mode]: Using Exceed attacks up to 5 times in quick succession will increase the Attack Speed and HP Cost of the Exceed skills
  • Additionally for your 1st - 3rd Job Exceed attacks, it also increases their range
  • For your 4th Job Exceed attack, increases the number of hits per attack
  • Upon using , Exceed levels will reduced by half

primary.name: Hyper Potion Mastery
primary.shortDesc: Potion Recovery Rate: +200%
details: Affects percentage recovery-based items too

primary.name: Star Force Conversion
primary.shortDesc: Max HP increases proportional to the Star Force on your equipped items

primary.name: Blood Pact
primary.shortDesc:
Damage calculated based on Max HP.
Only a set percentage of Bonus HP from Equipment items are applied.
Base HP confers a greater damage bonus than HP bonuses from equipment and items.
Allows you to ignore stat requirements on Warrior and Demon Avenger equipment.
In situations where HP cannot be recovered, HP consumed by the 1st through 4th tier job skills will be reduced by 90%.
primary.desc: Your damage is calculated based on your Max HP
details: You also ignore the stat requirements of Warrior equipment
Base HP increases damage more than HP bonuses from equipment and items

HP consumption of 1st to 4th Job skills are reduced when HP cannot be recovered
  • For example, bosses that prevent HP recovery and potion use

primary.name: Hero's Echo
primary.shortDesc: MP Cost: 30, Attack Power and Magic ATT: +4%, Duration: 40 min
details: To obtain this skill, complete the quest 'Love Lost, but not Forgotten'
Affects all nearby players
Has a cooldown (2 hrs)

primary.name: Exceed: Double Slash
primary.shortDesc: HP Cost: 1%, Damage: 200%, Number of Attacks: 2, Max Enemies Hit: 8

primary.name: Overload Release
primary.shortDesc: Resets Overload to 0. Duration: 90 sec, Final damage: +15%, Max HP Restored: 100%\n20% of overall HP restored even when under the effect of certain statuses (not including the recovery reductions from Demonic Frenzy or the ones within Ghost Park).
primary.desc: Releases all stacks of Overload and restores %Max HP while granting a %Final Damage buff
details: HP restore is reduced when under recovery restriction statuses (not including or in Ghost Park)

primary.name: Life Sap
primary.shortDesc: 100% chance to recover 5% HP on hit

primary.name: Demonic Veracity
primary.shortDesc: Speed: +45, Max Speed: +20, Jump: +20, Critical Rate: +20%

primary.name: Exceed: Demon Strike
primary.shortDesc: HP Cost: 1%, Damage: 125%, Number of Attacks: 4, Max Enemies Hit: 10
primary.desc: Dash forward while slicing through enemies

primary.name: Bat Swarm
primary.shortDesc: HP Cost: 1% of Max HP, Damage: 200%, Number of Attacks: 40.\nThe cloud expires once you finish attacking, move a certain distance, or its timer runs out. Press the skill key again to change direction.
primary.desc: Summons a swarm of bats that damages enemies it passes through
details: Pressing the Skill Key again will change the directions of the bat
Bats expire once it moves a certain distance, or its timer runs out

primary.name: Agile Demon
primary.shortDesc: Attack Speed: +2, Max HP: +400

primary.name: Unbreakable Steel
primary.shortDesc: Permanently increases Defense by 100%.

primary.name: Desperado Mastery
primary.shortDesc: Permanently increases Desperado Mastery by 50%.

primary.name: Rage Within
primary.shortDesc: Permanently increases Max HP by 600 and Defense by 500

primary.name: Abyssal Connection
primary.shortDesc: Attack +40

primary.name: Exceed: Lunar Slash
primary.shortDesc: HP Cost: 3%, Damage: 300%, Number of Attacks: 3, Max Enemies Hit: 10

primary.name: Vitality Veil
primary.shortDesc: HP Cost per attack: 100, Enemies hit with Key Pressed: 12, Damage: 300%, HP Restored: 10%.\nExplosion Damage: 1000%\nCooldown: 12 sec
primary.desc: When held, continuously damages nearby enemies around you
details: At the end of the attack, the skill explodes

primary.name: Shield Charge
primary.shortDesc: HP Cost: 2% of Max HP, Enemies Hit: 12, Damage: 200%, Number of Attacks: 2.\nEnemies Hit After Charge: 12, Damage After Charge: 200%
primary.desc: Charge forward and push enemies along with you
details: Has a chance to stun enemies

primary.name: Ward Evil
primary.shortDesc: HP Cost: 900, Duration: 180 sec, Elemental Resistance: +50%, Status Resistance: +50, Damage Intake: -30%

primary.name: Diabolic Recovery
primary.shortDesc: HP Cost: 900, Duration: 180 sec, Max HP: +25%. Restores 5% HP every 4 sec

primary.name: Pain Dampener
primary.shortDesc: Exceed Overload HP Absorption Penalty: -2%, Exceed Damage: +20%
primary.desc: Reduces the penalty to from and increases the %Damage of Exceed Skills

primary.name: Advanced Life Sap
primary.shortDesc: Increases Life Sap's absorption amount boosted to 10% of Max HP, Overload Release's final damage increase amount boosted to 25%.
primary.desc: Increases the healing from and increases the %Final Damage provided from

primary.name: Exceed: Execution
primary.shortDesc: HP Cost: 4%, Damage: 540%, Number of Attacks: 4, Max Enemies Hit: 2. Enemy DEF Ignored: 30%.
primary.desc: Unleash a powerful attack that hits up to 2 enemies
details: Attack also have increases %Ignore DEF
Exceed Mode increases number of hits per attack (by 2)

primary.name: Nether Shield
primary.shortDesc: HP Cost: 8% of Max HP, Shields: 2, Damage: 500%, Number of Attacks: 2, Attacks per Shield: 8.\nCooldown: 6 sec\n[Passive Effect: Exceed: Lunar Slash Damage: +330%]
primary.desc: Create homing shields that seek and attack enemies
details: [Passive]: Permanently increases the %Damage of
Prioritizes bosses with the highest HP first
Unaffected by Damage Reflect

primary.name: Nether Slice
primary.shortDesc: HP Cost: 1000, Enemies Hit: 12, Damage: 350%, Number of Attacks: 4, Debuff Duration: 60 sec, Enemy DEF: -30%\n[Passive Effect: Exceed: Demon Strike Damage: +155%]
details:
[Debuff]: Reduces %DEF
  • Reduction to %DEF can be considered as %Ignore DEF
[Passive]: Increases the %Damage of

primary.name: Blood Prison
primary.shortDesc: HP Cost: 5000, Max Enemies Hit: 14, Damage: 800%, Number of Attacks: 3, Stun Duration: 10 sec.\nStun Duration: +100% depending on damage inflicted with Blood Prison.\nCooldown: 120 sec
primary.desc: Unleashes a large attack that binds nearby enemies

primary.name: Maple Warrior
primary.shortDesc: HP Cost: 1000, Duration: 900 sec, All Stats assigned APs: +15%\n[Passive - Max HP: +15%]

primary.name: The Demon's Will
primary.shortDesc: HP Cost: 30, Cooldown: 300 sec
primary.desc: Removes certain abnormal status effects and become immune to Abnormal Status for 3 secs
details: Unaffected by Combat Orders

primary.name: Overwhelming Power
primary.shortDesc: Final Damage: +15%, Damage: +30%, Attack Speed: +1

primary.name: Defense Expertise
primary.shortDesc: Enemy DEF Ignored: 30%, Shield Charge and Nether Shield Damage: +20%.\nShield Charge and Nether Shield ignore 2x DEF.

primary.name: Advanced Desperado Mastery
primary.shortDesc: Desperado Mastery: +70%, Attack Power: +50, Critical Damage: +8%
details: Increases %Weapon Mastery
Now grants flat Attack and increases %Crit Damage

primary.name: Infernal Exceed
primary.shortDesc: [Final Attack Skills] Chance to deliver an extra attack after Exceed: 70%, Damage: 200%, Bonus Number of Attacks: 2, Max Enemies Hit: 2
primary.desc: Using Exceed Skills have a chance to deal an additional attack

hyperPassive.name: Exceed - Reduce Overload
hyperPassive.desc: Reduces max Overload stacks from 20 to 18

hyperPassive.name: Exceed - Opportunity
hyperPassive.desc: Increases the chance for to activate

hyperPassive.name: Nether Shield - Spread
hyperPassive.shortDesc: Permanently increases the max number of attacks per Nether Shield by 2.

hyperActive.name: Forbidden Contract
hyperActive.shortDesc: HP Cost: 5000 , Duration: 30 sec, Damage: +10%, Skill HP Consumption: 0\nCooldown: 75 sec

hyperActive.name: Thousand Swords
hyperActive.shortDesc: Max HP Cost: 15%, Exceed Overload: +5, Damage: 500%, Number of Attacks: 8, Max Enemies Hit: 14\nCooldown: 8 sec
hyperActive.desc: Unleash a flurry of attacks around you
details: Upon use, increases Overload stacks

hyperActive.name: Demonic Fortitude
hyperActive.shortDesc: HP Cost: 100, Duration: 60 sec, Damage: +10%\nCooldown: 120 sec. Only applies to Demon, Resistance, and Xenon party members.

fifthMain.name: Demonic Frenzy
fifthMain.shortDesc:
HP Cost: 20% of Max HP, consumes 6000 HP per sec, Healing Restriction: items and skills can only heal 1% of Max HP, hit damage -30% (including the damage proportional to Max HP)
Final Damage: +1% and can be increased up to 20% per 2% HP consumed. Your demonic blood, burning with vengeance, lingers in the area, periodically dealing 765% damage on up to 10 enemies 3 times
When your HP falls below 30%, the HP loss will cease, and Demonic Frenzy will no longer restrict your healing.
Reusing this skill during its effect will deactivate that effect.
Cooldown: 1 sec
fifthMain.desc: While toggled, gain increased %Final Damage and create a zone around you that damages enemies within it
details: Costs HP to activate and drains HP each sec while active
Items and skills can only recover 1% Max HP but you take reduced damage (including %Max HP attacks)
When your HP falls below 30%, your HP will no longer drain and will no longer have any healing restrictions
Pressing the Skill Key again ends the skill early

fifthMain.name: Demonic Blast
fifthMain.shortDesc: Consumes 3% of Max HP, Max Enemies Hit: 8, Damage: 1450%, Number of Attacks: 12. For attacks that inflict damage at a certain ratio of the target's Max HP, Damage -30%.\nHP Recovery: 25% of Max HP, Additional Critical Rate: 100%, Additional Ignore Defense: 100%\nCooldown: 12 sec.
fifthMain.desc: Releases an explosion that damages enemies around you
details:
If the attack defeats an enemy or hits a boss, you restore some %Max HP
  • HP recovered is not affected by or Ghost Park
While casting, increases %Damage Reduction including %Max HP attacks
The attack is a guaranteed Critical Hit and will have 100% Ignore DEF
Can be used while using other skills

fifthMain.name: Dimensional Sword
fifthMain.shortDesc:
HP Cost: 20% of Max HP. Summon a magic sword for 40 sec every 3 sec. Max Enemies Hit: 8, Damage: 1850%, Number of Attacks: 14
The skill duration becomes 1/5 if the skill is used again while summoning, but the magic sword will spin quickly and deal 900% damage to 8 enemies 8 times.
All Dimensional Sword hits receive Additional Monster DEF Ignored: +100%
Cooldown: 120 sec
fifthMain.desc: Summon swords above your head that periodically slashes forward at nearby enemies
details: Pressing the Skill Key again while the skill is active will reduce the duration but the swords will spin around you to deal damage to nearby enemies
Attack has 100% Ignore DEF
Unaffected by Damage Reflect

fifthMain.name: Revenant
fifthMain.shortDesc:
HP Cost: 25% of Max HP, Duration: 15 sec
When using the Exceed skill, activates Thorn of Fury, which damages 5 enemies with 900% damage 12 time(s). Additional Monster DEF Ignored: +30%, Cooldown: 4 sec
Saves Damage Taken, up to 100% of Max HP, as Fury, and reduces cooldown in proportion to amount saved. Your current Fury amount decreases by 7% periodically.
After the skill ends, any saved Fury, plus 1% of max HP will come back to you as damage 25 time(s). This damage cannot kill you by itself.
Cooldown: 120 sec
fifthMain.desc: While active, you cannot go below 1 HP and whenever you use an Exceed attack, an additional attack appears
details:
All damage taken will be stored as 'Rage' (up to 100% of Max HP)
  • Rage will slowly decay while the skill is active
  • Cooldown of the additional attack is reduced based on your Rage
  • At the end of the skill, you will take damage equal to the Rage stored but it cannot kill you
Additional attack has increased %Ignore DEF and ignores Damage Reflect
Pressing the Skill Key again will cancel the skill early
Unaffected by Damage Reflect

masteryCore.name: HEXA Nether Shield
masteryCore.shortDesc: HP Cost: 8% of Max HP, Number of Shields: 3, Damage: 840%, Number of Attacks: 2, Max Number of Attacks: 8 per shield\nWhen a single target is hit repeatedly, Final Damage: -30%\nCooldown: 6 sec

originSkill.name: Requiem
originSkill.shortDesc:
HP Cost: 15% of Max HP, invincible during casting
Max Enemies Hit: 15, Damage: 7500%, Number of Attacks: 8, Chase Cuts: 10, then summons Demon Requiem Sword
Demon Requiem Sword - Duration: 15 sec, Max Enemies Hit: 15, Damage: 3600%, Number of Attacks: 12
Using skill again after 4 sec of summoning, Max Enemies Hit: 15, Damage: 9600%, Number of Attacks: 14, Demon Sword Roar Activations: 6, invincible during casting of Demon Sword Roar
Cooldown: 360 sec

meta: Demon Avenger is HP warrior class part of the Demons & Resistance class group. Demon Avengers use HP for their attacks and do not have an MP resource. As well, instead of scaling off of STR like regular warriors, Demon Avengers' damage scales off of HP
